titleStmt.title: The summe & substance of Christian religion set downe in a catechisticall way, by H.I.
Summe and substance of Christian religion.
titleStmt.author: Isaacson, Henry, 1581-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: by W. Wilson, and are to be sold by Richard Thrale at Pauls gate at the signe of the Crosse-keyes,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Isaacson, Henry. "The summe and substance of Christian religion", first published in 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
